verses.t: Him that is weak{G770} in the faith{G3588} receive ye{G4355}, but not{G3361} to{G1519} doubtful{G1261} disputations{G1253}.
For{G3303} one{G3739} believeth{G4100} that he may eat{G5315} all things{G3956}: another{G1161}, who is weak{G770}, eateth{G2068} herbs{G3001}.

Let{G1848} not{G3361} him that eateth{G2068} despise{G1848} him that eateth{G2068} not{G3361}; and{G2532} let{G2919} not{G3361} him which eateth{G2068} not{G3361} judge{G2919} him that eateth{G2068}: for{G1063} God{G3588} hath received{G4355} him{G846}.

Who{G5101} art{G1488} thou{G4771} that judgest{G2919} another man's{G245} servant{G3610}? to his own{G2398} master{G2962} he standeth{G4739} or{G2228} falleth{G4098}. Yea{G1161}, he shall be holden up{G2476}: for{G1063} God{G3588} is{G2076} able{G1415} to make{G2476} him{G846} stand{G2476}.

One man{G3739} esteemeth{G2919} one day{G2250} above{G3844} another{G2250}: another{G3739} esteemeth{G2919} every{G3956} day{G2250} alike. Let{G4135} every man{G1538} be fully persuaded{G4135} in{G1722} his own{G2398} mind{G3563}.

He that regardeth{G5426} the day{G3588}, regardeth{G5426} it unto the Lord{G2962}; and{G2532} he that regardeth{G5426} not{G3361} the day{G3588}, to the Lord{G2962} he doth{G5426} not{G3756} regard{G5426} it. He that eateth{G2068}, eateth{G2068} to the Lord{G2962}, for{G1063} he giveth{G2168} God{G3588} thanks{G2168}; and{G2532} he that eateth{G2068} not{G3361}, to the Lord{G2962} he eateth{G2068} not{G3756}, and{G2532} giveth{G2168} God{G3588} thanks{G2168}.
For{G1063} none{G3762} of us{G2257} liveth{G2198} to himself{G1438}, and{G2532} no man{G3762} dieth{G599} to himself{G1438}.

For{G1063} whether{G1437} we live{G2198}, we live{G2198}unto the Lord{G3588}; and{G5037} whether{G1437} we die{G599}, we die{G599} unto the Lord{G3588}: whether{G1437} we live{G2198} therefore{G3767}, or{G1437} die{G599}, we are{G2070} the Lord's{G3588}.

For{G1063} to{G1519} this end{G5124} Christ{G5547} both{G2532} died{G599}, and{G2532} rose{G450}, and{G2532} revived{G326}, that{G2443} he might be Lord{G2961} both{G2532} of the dead{G3498} and{G2532} living{G2198}.

But{G1161} why{G5101} dost{G2919} thou{G4771} judge{G2919} thy{G4675} brother{G3588}? or{G2228} why{G5101} dost{G1848} thou{G4771} set at nought{G1848} thy{G4675} brother{G3588}? for{G1063} we shall{G3936} all{G3956} stand{G3936} before the judgment seat{G3588} of Christ{G3588}.

For{G1063} it is written{G1125}, As I{G1473} live{G2198}, saith{G3004} the Lord{G2962}, every{G3956} knee{G1119} shall bow{G2578} to me{G1698}, and{G2532} every{G3956} tongue{G1100} shall confess{G1843} to God{G3588}.
So{G686} then{G3767} every one{G1538} of us{G2257} shall give{G1325} account{G3056} of{G4012} himself{G1438} to God{G3588}.

Let us{G2919} not{G3371} therefore{G3767} judge{G2919} one another{G240} any more{G3371}: but{G235} judge{G2919} this{G5124} rather{G3123}, that{G3588} no man{G3361} put{G5087} a stumblingblock{G4348} or{G2228} an occasion to fall{G4625} in{G3588} his brother's way{G80}.

I know{G1492}, and{G2532} am persuaded{G3982} by{G1722} the Lord{G2962} Jesus{G2424}, that{G3754} there is nothing{G3762} unclean{G2839} of{G1223} itself{G1438}: but{G3361} to him that esteemeth{G3049} any thing{G5100} to be{G1511} unclean{G2839}, to him{G1565} it is unclean{G2839}.

But{G1161} if{G1487} thy{G4675} brother{G3588} be grieved{G3076} with{G1223} thy meat{G1033}, now{G3765} walkest thou{G4043} not{G3765} charitably{G26}. Destroy{G622} not{G3361} him{G1565} with{G3588} thy{G4675} meat{G1033}, for{G5228} whom{G3739} Christ{G5547} died{G599}.
Let{G987} not{G3361} then{G3767} your{G5216} good{G18} be evil spoken of{G987}:

For{G1063} the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588} is{G2076} not{G3756} meat{G1035} and{G2532} drink{G4213}; but{G235} righteousness{G1343}, and{G2532} peace{G1515}, and{G2532} joy{G5479} in{G1722} the{G4151} Holy{G40} Ghost{G4151}.
For{G1063} he that{G1398} in{G1722} these things{G5125} serveth{G1398} Christ{G3588} is acceptable{G2101} to God{G3588}, and{G2532} approved{G1384} of men{G3588}.
Let us{G1377} therefore{G3767} follow after{G1377} the things{G3588} which make for peace{G3588}, and{G2532} things{G3588} wherewith one may edify{G3588} another{G240}.

For{G1752} meat{G1033} destroy{G2647} not{G3361} the work{G3588} of God{G3588}. All things{G3956} indeed{G3303} are pure{G2513}; but{G235} it is evil{G2556} for that man{G3588} who eateth{G2068} with{G1223} offence{G4348}.

It is good{G2570} neither{G3361} to eat{G5315} flesh{G2907}, nor{G3366} to drink{G4095} wine{G3631}, nor{G3366} any thing whereby{G1722} thy{G4675} brother{G3588} stumbleth{G4350}, or{G2228} is offended{G4624}, or{G2228} is made weak{G770}.

Hast{G2192} thou{G4771} faith{G4102}? have{G2192} it to{G2596} thyself{G4572} before{G1799} God{G3588}. Happy{G3107} is he that condemneth{G2919} not{G3361} himself{G1438} in{G1722} that thing which{G3739} he alloweth{G1381}.

And{G1161} he that doubteth{G1252} is damned{G2632} if{G1437} he eat{G5315}, because{G3754} he eateth not{G3756} of{G1537} faith{G4102}: for{G1161} whatsoever{G3956} is not{G3756} of{G1537} faith{G4102} is{G2076} sin{G266}.
